thread.title: Jeanette Miedema
thread.title_full: The Official ECCO Shop recenserad av Jeanette Miedema

author: Jeanette Miedema
title: Jeanette Miedema
text: My shoes should have been delivered by UPS on january 9 at the end of the day. I was at home 13.00. I noticed that UPS had been at my door at 12.10 and I had to collect my shoes at a UPS point. I was very angry and tried te get in contact with UPS. This was impossible the site and telephonenumber were very difficult. I called the ecco service. I could tell mij story and the person listened. He could understand my anger. He said he would try to get in contact with UPS and would call me back. So he did. UPS could not deliver again but he tried and asked it and gave me the information back. Therefor i made my compliments to de ecco service man for the way het had acted. It is not Always easy when clients are angry but he did it kindly and professionally.
